content.raw:
Also, a minor issue slightly related to this I came up with when trying to control programmatically the playback:

The LogPlay::seek method [documentation](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/967dd13487ff1be8bcb9f83e020e936219a7de55/gazebo/util/LogPlay.hh#lines-119) contradicts the [message](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/967dd13487ff1be8bcb9f83e020e936219a7de55/gazebo/msgs/log_playback_control.proto#lines-29)

And the [tests](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/967dd13487ff1be8bcb9f83e020e936219a7de55/test/integration/world_playback.cc#lines-273) seem to assert that the behavior is the one described in the message, that it seeks the first frame with a time equal or bigger. So if I understood correctly, the seek method documentation should be updated.

I tried to make a pull request but I get stuck on an access denied.
content.html:
Also, a minor issue slightly related to this I came up with when trying to control programmatically the playback:

The LogPlay::seek method documentation contradicts the message

And the tests seem to assert that the behavior is the one described in the message, that it seeks the first frame with a time equal or bigger. So if I understood correctly, the seek method documentation should be updated.

I tried to make a pull request but I get stuck on an access denied.
